metadata.title: Set Up Code Quality Tools (ESLint & Prettier)

prompt.goal: Set Up Code Quality Tools (ESLint & Prettier). To ensure code consistency and maintain high code quality from the start, this task involves setting up ESLint for static analysis and Prettier for automated code formatting.

context.description: To ensure code consistency and maintain high code quality from the start, this task involves setting up ESLint for static analysis and Prettier for automated code formatting. This helps in catching errors early and maintaining a uniform codebase.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: ESLint and Prettier are added as dev dependencies.
Configuration files (`.eslintrc.js`, `.prettierrc`) are created in the project root.
An npm script `lint` is added to `package.json` to run ESLint.
An npm script `format` is added to `package.json` to run Prettier.
